text: This text appears to be a post about downloading the TV show "Constellation" in various video qualities and with different subtitle options from various sources such as Bilibili, UCNetdisk, QuarkCDN, Aliyun Pan, Xunlei Pan, and Baidu Netdisk. The post also provides magnet links for torrent downloads of the episodes without subtitles or with embedded Chinese subtitles. It concludes by inviting readers to scan a QR code or search for the public account "BluFilm" on WeChat to follow for more content related to movies and TV shows.
